LanguageData.RK_Scenario.label: Ratkin Colony
LanguageData.RK_Scenario.description:
The four of you had come from different walks of life.

Some left their hometowns in the countryside in search of adventure. Others were exiled from the Kingdom for various misdemeanors. And others still were lost souls, wandering aimlessly in search of a purpose in life.

Whatever your stories were and whatever dreams you once held, none of that matters anymore - for fate and happenstance have brought everyone together to build a new beginning.
